```{r libs}
library(tidyverse)

## Intro

This Rmd file pulls results generated by explore-mif-results.R and displays them.


## MIF traces


```{r traceplot,  fig.cap='MIF trace plot'}
knitr::include_graphics(here('output/figures/mif-traces.png'))
```

## Parameter and LL tables

Parameters and LL for each MIF run

```{r par-tables}
table1a=readRDS(here('output/tables/par-table.Rds'))
table2a=readRDS(here('output/tables/par-nat-table.Rds'))
table1 = data.frame(t(table1a))
table2 = data.frame(t(table2a))
knitr::kable(table1, caption = 'LL and parameters as estimated.')
knitr::kable(table2, caption = 'LL and parameters transformed to meaningful units.')
```
```
